thought: The Slack message action is sending a message with 'Placeholder' text instead of the actual formatted message. This is because the 'text' parameter in the Slack action params is hardcoded as 'Placeholder'. We need to make the Slack action's 'text' param dynamic by using expression to read the 'text' field from input data's json, so that the formatted message from the workflow can be sent correctly.
plan: Change Slack action (action_1) params 'text' field to use expression '={{$json["text"]}}' to dynamically get message text from input data.
Keep channel selection as name 'weathers' and messageType as 'text'.
Test Slack message sending to verify the message text is correct.
